arts.ttl: Venezia vs. Como, a big battle at the bottom
arts.sum: Venezia are the team that have scored the fewest goals from open play in Serie A this season (4), while only Hellas Verona (28) have conceded more such goals than Como (18 – level with Parma). Como are unbeaten against Venezia in Serie A though the only previous season in which the two teams faced each other in the competition dates back to 1949/50, when the Larians won the first meeting 2-1, then drew 0-0 in the second meeting.

arts.ttl: Serie A | Venezia v Como: Match Prediction, Preview, Team News and Lineups
